title: What song do you first think of when you wake up in the morning? - Quora

response.answer_text: I had my playlist running as I did my paperwork right before lights out. When I got up to pee, it was still rattling around up there in the ol' skull cavity. That's because there's nothing up there to stop it. So, I guess it should come as no surprise that it was still an ear worm when I got up this morning. I hesitate to play it because I'm getting ready to turn in which means it's going to be stuck in my head again all night. Dreadlock Holiday by 10cc , The song, written by frontman and bassist, Graham Gouldman, is losely based on a misguided vacation by Moody Blues frontman Justin Hayward in Barbados as he's confronted by four locals.

I just got into kpop recently.... So when u woke up I had the song “baby” by ASTRO in my head when I woke up this morning, and what was funny is. I had a friend stay the night with me that night and we stayed up till 5 in the morning listening to kpop, but we listened to this one song so much I sung it in my sleep. My friend laghted so hard she woke me up and I started laughing after she told me why she was laughing. I don't know why, but at that moment I thought that was the worlds funniest thing and the lauhting lasted about 6 minutes. Lol!
